backend/main.mo: Actor includes blob-storage mixin to provide storage functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing spacing reduction change on AboutPage and related metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing summaries of all major frontend files and recent updates.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and typography.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with metadata and favicon links loading the React app root and main.tsx.
frontend/README_DRAFT_ONLY.md: Draft review notes for version 26 with profile image update and WhatsApp CTA consistency checklist.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, theme provider, and query client, with AboutPage as default route.
frontend/src/components/FaviconLoader.ts: Empty component placeholder for dynamic favicon loading.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout with header, navigation, mobile menu, scroll-to-top behavior, footer, and floating WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppCTAButto: Reusable CTA button linking to WhatsApp using shared styling and deep link utility.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppFloating: Fixed-position floating WhatsApp button opening chat link in a new tab.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and updates a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, including login state handling and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook that exposes backend readiness state via useActor, reserved for future backend integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color themes, typography, scrollbars, and utility animations for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates a WhatsApp deep link with a preset phone number and encoded message.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays a detailed professional overview with profile information, biography, and WhatsApp contact link.
frontend/src/pages/CaseStudiesPage.tsx: Renders multiple case studies with context, challenges, approaches, tools, and outcomes for BI projects.
frontend/src/pages/CertificationsPage.ts: Empty page file reserved for future certifications content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, FormSubmit.co email handling, and WhatsApp contact option.
frontend/src/pages/ExperiencePage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for future experience page implementation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component rotating taglines, showing BI service highlights, a hero section, credibility stats, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/pages/ImpactPage.tsx: Impact page listing BI achievements with sections of descriptions and measurable outcomes plus organizational benefits.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Services page defining BI service offerings with problems, deliverables, and outcomes along with a CTA section.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, features, new requests, and configuration for ongoing spacing adjustment work on the About page.
